name: Verify Camera Light Rendering in Electrical Room Corner
description: Validates that camera light remains visible or culls appropriately in electrical room corner.
testObjective: Ensure rendering system handles camera light visibility correctly.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Walk up to observe the camera
steps.expected: Camera is visible with light around it

steps.action: Walk to the far-most right corner of the room
Observe the light around the camera from this position
steps.expected: Camera light remains visible or culls gracefully without visual artifacts

postconditions: Visual rendering is acceptable from all room positions
